set(CC_BASE_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
set(CC_BUILD_BASE_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
message("CC_BASE_INCLUDE_DIR is ${CC_BASE_INCLUDE_DIR}")
add_subdirectory(column-io)
